{\footnotesize\ttfamily template$<$int K$>$ \\
\mbox{\hyperlink{classKBLASMemoryTreeNode}{KBLASMemory\+Tree\+Node}}$<$ K $>$\+::\mbox{\hyperlink{classKBLASMemoryTreeNode}{KBLASMemory\+Tree\+Node}} (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const \mbox{\hyperlink{classKHyperrect}{Hyperrect}} \&}]{r,  }\item[{const int}]{k,  }\item[{const Color}]{color,  }\item[{const \mbox{\hyperlink{classKBLASMemoryTreeNode}{Node}} $\ast$}]{src,  }\item[{const size\+\_\+t}]{sizeof\+\_\+type }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}

A new node is being created from a split, make it inherit its original node \textquotesingle{}src\textquotesingle{}
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item access -\/ the access
\item r -\/ the shrinked rect that this is inheriting from
\item k -\/ the dimension that got splitted
\item color -\/ the node color
\item src -\/ the node that got split
\end{DoxyItemize}

We have\+: U (src-\/$>$hyperrect, r) == the node rect before being shrinked n (src-\/$>$hyperrect, r) = \{\} -\/ empty intersection
